column5: Havent ice fished in years and found some old ice fishing rods of mine.  Might take my wife out ( who doesnt fish) on Tuesday, so I need a place to rent a hut and get into some fish to keep her busy.  haha.  Probably will go to Simcoe, thx
Family Ice Cabins on Gilford rd.  Dave is a great guy and its great for first timers!  Google it for contact info.
Double thumbs up for Dave and family ice cabins.
Thanks guys, didnt end up getting out. She chose for us to go to her business and clean instead. Haha
you still have tomorrow!  its the last day of the season so there is still a chance.
Ya still didnt get out. Had to go on my wife's business trip and be on Daddy duties. I might be heading up to Nipissing tonight and fish tomorrow
